---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is a `package.json` file for the `tar-fs` npm package, which provides filesystem bindings for tar-stream. It defines the package's metadata, dependencies, scripts, and other configuration details necessary for npm to manage the package.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
Defines essential information about the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| name | "tar-fs" | The name of the package |
| version | "2.1.1" | The current version of the package |
| description | "filesystem bindings for tar-stream" | A brief description of the package's purpose |
| main | "index.js" | The main entry point of the package |
| author | "Mathias Buus" | The author of the package |
| license | "MIT" | The license under which the package is distributed |

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the runtime dependencies required by the package.

| Dependency | Version | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|:--------|
| chownr | "^1.1.1" | Likely used for changing ownership of files and directories |
| mkdirp-classic | "^0.5.2" | Probably used for creating directories recursively |
| pump | "^3.0.0" | Likely used for piping streams |
| tar-stream | "^2.1.4" | The core tar streaming functionality |

### DevDependencies
#### Description
Lists the development dependencies used for testing and linting.

| Dependency | Version | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|:--------|
| rimraf | "^2.6.3" | Probably used for recursive directory deletion in tests |
| standard | "^13.0.1" | Used for linting the codebase |
| tape | "^4.9.2" | Used for running tests |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines npm scripts for running tests and linting.

| Script | Command | Purpose |
|:-------|:--------|:--------|
| test | "standard && tape test/index.js" | Runs the linter and executes tests |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the source code repository.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| type | "git" | Indicates that the repository is a Git repository |
| url | "https://github.com/mafintosh/tar-fs.git" | The URL of the Git repository |

### Other Metadata
#### Description
Additional metadata about the package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| keywords | ["tar", "fs", "file", "tarball", "directory", "stream"] | Keywords for package discovery |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| chownr | Changing ownership of files and directories |
| mkdirp-classic | Creating directories recursively |
| pump | Piping streams |
| tar-stream | Core tar streaming functionality |

Note: The exact purposes of these dependencies are inferred based on their names and common usage patterns. The actual usage may vary within the package implementation.
